name: @auto_tlrc
author: Ziad S. Saad
description: A script to transform an anatomical dataset to align with some standard space template and to apply the same TLRC transform obtained with @auto_tlrc in Usage 1 mode to other datasets.

inputs.name: Base Template
inputs.description: Reference anatomical volume. Usually this volume is in some standard space like TLRC or MNI space.

inputs.name: Input Anatomical Volume
inputs.description: Original anatomical volume (+orig). The skull is removed by this script unless instructed otherwise (-no_ss).

inputs.name: No Skull Stripping
inputs.description: Do not strip skull of input data set because the skull has already been removed or because the template still has the skull.

inputs.name: Warp Original Volume
inputs.description: Produce a TLRC version of the input volume, rather than a TLRC version of the skull-stripped input.

inputs.name: Cubic Voxel Size
inputs.description: Cubic voxel size of output DSET in TLRC space. Default is the resolution of the template.

inputs.name: Voxel Size in X Direction
inputs.description: Size of voxel in the x direction (Right-Left). Default is 1mm.

inputs.name: Voxel Size in Y Direction
inputs.description: Size of voxel in the y direction (Anterior-Posterior). Default is 1mm.

inputs.name: Voxel Size in Z Direction
inputs.description: Size of voxel in the z direction (Inferior-Superior). Default is 1mm.

inputs.name: Pad Base Dataset
inputs.description: Pad the base dataset by MM mm in each direction. Default is 15 mm.

inputs.name: Keep Temporary Files
inputs.description: Keep temporary files.

inputs.name: Clean Temporary Files
inputs.description: Clean all temporary files, likely left from -keep_tmp option then exit.

inputs.name: Transform for Warping
inputs.description: Transform to use for warping: Choose from affine_general or shift_rotate_scale. Default is affine_general.

inputs.name: No Avoid Eyes
inputs.description: An option that gets passed to 3dSkullStrip. Use it when parts of the frontal lobes get clipped.

inputs.name: No Coarse Rotation
inputs.description: Do not use -coarserot option for 3dWarpDrive, which is a default.

inputs.name: Single Pass Registration
inputs.description: Turns off -twopass option for 3dWarpDrive. This will speed up the registration but might fail if the datasets are far apart.

inputs.name: Two Pass Registration
inputs.description: Opposite of -onepass, default.

inputs.name: Maximum Number of Iterations
inputs.description: Maximum number of iterations for 3dWarpDrive. Default is 50 for first pass and then doubled to 100 in second pass.

inputs.name: Not OK Maximum Iterations
inputs.description: Continue running even if maximum iterations is reached.

inputs.name: Input Weight
inputs.description: Apply -weight INPUT (in 3dWarpDrive). By default, 3dWarpDrive uses the BASE dataset to weight the alignment cost.

inputs.name: Rigid Body Alignment
inputs.description: Output the rigid-body version of the alignment. Resultant volume is NOT in TLRC space.

inputs.name: Initial Transform
inputs.description: Apply affine transform in XFORM0.1D before beginning registration and then include XFORM0.1D in the final transform.

inputs.name: Delete Temporary Dataset
inputs.description: Delete temporary dataset created by -init_xform

inputs.name: Output Space
inputs.description: Set the output to a particular space.

inputs.name: Use 3dAllineate
inputs.description: Use 3dAllineate with the lpa+ZZ cost function instead of 3dWarpDrive.

inputs.name: Cost function for 3dAllineate
inputs.description: Use another cost function like nmi for 3dAllineate.

inputs.name: Overwrite Output
inputs.description: Overwrite existing output.

inputs.name: Anatomical Dataset Parent
inputs.description: An anatomical dataset in TLRC space created using Usage 1 of @auto_tlrc.

inputs.name: Input Dataset
inputs.description: Dataset (typically EPI time series or statistical dataset) to transform to TLRC space per the transform in TLRC_parent

inputs.name: Pad Input Dataset
inputs.description: Pad the input dataset by MM mm in each direction.

inputs.name: Single Interpolation Step
inputs.description: Create follower data with one interpolation step, instead of two. This option reduces blurring of the output data.

inputs.name: Two Interpolation Steps
inputs.description: Create follower data with two interpolations step, instead of one. This option is for backward compatibility.

inputs.name: Resampling Mode
inputs.description: Resampling mode. Choose from: linear, cubic, NN or quintic. Default for 'Usage 1' is cubic.

inputs.name: Output Prefix
inputs.description: Name of the output dataset.

inputs.name: Output Suffix
inputs.description: Name the output dataset by appending this suffix to the prefix of the input data.

inputs.name: Keep Output View
inputs.description: Do not mark output dataset as +tlrc.

inputs.name: Copy Base Dataset
inputs.description: Copy base (template) dataset into COPY_PREFIX.

inputs.name: List Base Dataset Path
inputs.description: List the full path of the base dataset.

inputs.name: Use GZIP Compression
inputs.description: When using '-suffix ..', behave as if you had provided a prefix with '*.gz' at the end.

inputs.name: Verbose
inputs.description: Increase verbosity of the script.

output-files.description: Transformed anatomical volume dataset in TLRC space.
output-files.name: Transformed Anatomical Dataset

output-files.description: Transform used to align the anatomical dataset to the template.
output-files.name: Transformation File
